name: Push Fight
description:
THIS GAME IS AN UNNOFICIAL VIRTUAL VERSION OF THE AWESOME BOARD GAME CREATED BY BRETT PICOTTE (https://twitter.com/bpicotte).

YOU CAN PLAY THE GAME ONLINE VIA IP (ALSO VIA HAMACHI), LOCAL MULTIPLAYER OR SOLITAIRE PLAY.

ALL THE RULES CAN BE FOUND IN THE MAIN MENU OR AT THE GAME'S OFFICIAL WEBSITE: http://pushfightgame.com/rules.htm
